attributes.action: I want India to be put onto the red list.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to take this action as I feel it’s very wrong to put countries that are not deserving onto the red list, and a country like India which is a very high risk to the UK should be put onto the red list as they can spread more variants and virus to our country if they can freely be allowed to enter without any restrictions.
attributes.background: I want the government to put India onto the red list as the cases and death rates are very high as compared to other Asian countries that have been put onto the red list.
